bridge-type.label: UniFi Protect NVR
bridge-type.description: UniFi Protect NVR bridge providing device and event streams

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the NVR

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Local username for authentication (supports both Public and Private API)

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: API Token (Optional)
parameter.description: Public API token. If not provided, one will be automatically created using the name 'openHAB-{thing-id}'

parameter.name: enableWebRTC
parameter.label: Enable WebRTC
parameter.description: Enables WebRTC play and publish streams through openHAB
